section.title: Release 21.11 (?, 2021.11/??)
section.para: In addition to numerous new and upgraded packages, this release has the following highlights:

listitem.para: Support is planned until the end of April 2022, handing over to 22.05.
PHP now defaults to PHP 8.0, updated from 7.4.
geoipupdate, a GeoIP database updater from MaxMind. Available as services.geoipupdate.
The staticjinja package has been upgraded from 1.0.4 to 2.0.0
services.geoip-updater was broken and has been replaced by services.geoipupdate.
PHP 7.3 is no longer supported due to upstream not supporting this version for the entire lifecycle of the 21.11 release.
